org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text

Interface Field


  • public interface Field

    Identifiers for fields in a delimited/columnar database.

    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(String token, EventBuilder builder)
      Apply the field’s value to the builder.
      Class<? extends EventBuilder> getBuilderType()
      Get the builder type that this field operates on.
      String getName()
      Get the name for this field.
      boolean isOptional()
      Query whether this field is optional.

    • Method Detail

      • getBuilderType

        Class<? extends EventBuilder> getBuilderType()

        Get the builder type that this field operates on.

        Returns:
        The field’s builder type.

      • isOptional

        boolean isOptional()

        Query whether this field is optional.

        Returns:
        true if the field is optional.

      • apply

        void apply(String token,
           EventBuilder builder)

        Apply the field’s value to the builder.

        Parameters:
        token - The field value (or null if this is a nonexistent optional field).
        builder - The builder into which to set the value.

      • getName

        String getName()

        Get the name for this field.

        Note: If this name does not resolve back to an equivalent field when passed to Fields.byName(Class, String), data source specification is likely to break.

        Returns:
        The field name. May return null for an ignored field.
